original_text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, even as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.
korean_text: 그 후 호적할 때에 갈릴리의 유다가 일어나 백성을 꾀어 따르게 하다가 그도 망한즉 따르던 모든 사람들이 흩어졌느니라

sentences.original_text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 이 후에 갈릴리 유다라는 사람이 일어났고

sentences.original_text: in the days of the taxing
and drew away much people after him
and all, even as many as obeyed him
